text:
District M | Senior AWS Cloud and DevOps Engineer | Montreal, Quebec | ONSITE | Full-Time

District M is an ad tech company working on programmatic platforms for publishers and advertisers that are open and transparent, and we are looking for an experienced cloud / devops engineer to join and help us build and maintain our current and future stack

More details in the official Job Posting : https://districtm.net/en/careers/detail/senior-aws-cloud-and...

Interested applicants can email me directly : dom@districtm.net
